intro.p: Evaluate the following functions for the requested values:

content.p: \part[{{points_A}}] Find {{f_eval_str}} for the function defined by {{f_x_latex}}.
\part[{{points_B}}] Find the simplified expression for g(-x) given {{g_x_latex}}.
\part[{{points_C}}] Find h({{eval_point_h}}) for the piecewise function h(x) defined by {{h_x_latex}}.
